name: brightness
description: Adjust the brightness of the image

name: colorize
description: Blends a fill color with the image

name: comic
description: Apply a sketchy comic filter to an image

name: contrast
description: Changes the contrast of the image

name: darken
description: Changes the brightness of the image

name: dodge
description: Dodge an image, making it darker

name: duotone
description: Duotone filter. Enhances Red, Green or Blue or a combination

name: edge detect
description: Uses edge detection to highlight the edges in the image

name: emboss
description: Embosses the image

name: find edges
description: Find the edges in an image without color loss

name: flip
description: Flips an image over it's x- or y-axis

name: gamma correction
description: Apply gamma correction

name: gaussian blur
description: Blurs the image using the Gaussian method

name: greyscale
description: Converts the colors to grayscale

name: hue rotate
description: Rotate the hue of the image

name: mean remove
description: Uses mean removal to achieve a 'sketchy' effect

name: motion blur
description: Motion blurs the image

name: negative
description: Create a negative of an image

name: noise
description: add distortion (noise) to the image

name: old cardboard
description: Image filter to give the image an old cardboard look

name: pixelate
description: Pixelate an image

name: rotate
description: Rotate an image over an angle

name: rounded corners
description: add rounded corners to the image

name: scatter
description: Scatter pixels around in a random way

name: selective blur
description: Image filter Selective Blur

name: semi grayscale
description: Applies grayscale to an image, optionally add a grayscale percentage

name: sepia
description: Apply sepia to the image

name: sepia fast
description: Apply a septia filter on the image

name: sharpen
description: Sharpens the image

name: smooth
description: Makes the image smoother

name: sobel edge detect
description: Sobel edge detect (extremely slow...)

name: sobel edge enhance
description: Sobel edge detect

name: true color
description: Bring the image back to 2 colors.

name: vignette
description: Applies a darker mask around the edges of the image
